```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = F)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = F)

```

```{r}
library(googlesheets4)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(lubridate)

form = read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1IdyqL8RO6mar6dwBiB8UUdGwOBTkLGALX6InE2BCC6M/edit?usp=sharing")
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
for(i in 1:nrow(form)){
  cat(paste0("<h3>",form$Title[i], " </h3> <br> <b>Contact person: </b>", form$`Contact person`[i],"<br> <b>Related BN topic: </b>",form$`BN topics`, "<br> <p> [Link to the document](",form$Link[i], ") </p> <h4> Abstract/Idea </h4> <p>", form$Abstract[i], " </p> ")[1])
}
```
